Title.language: Psali Watos for the Three Saintly Children
Psali Watos for the Three Saintly Children

text.language: Tenoueh n~cwk qen penh/t t/rf: tenerho] qatekh/: ouoh tenkw] n~ca pekho: Vnou] m~per]sipi nan.
We follow You with all our hearts, and we fear You, and we seek Your face, O God do not forsake us.

language.div: Kami ikut-Mu segenap hati, dan takut pada-Mu, dan kami cari wajah-Mu,

text.language: نَتبعك بكل قلوبنا ونخافك ونطلب وجهكَ يا الله لا تخزنا.
Alla a~rioui~ neman: kata tekmete~pik/c: nem kata p~a~sai n~te peknai: Po#c# a~ribo/yin e~ron.
But rather deal with us, according to Your meekness, and according to Your great mercy, O Lord help us.

language.div: lakukanlah kepada kami, s’turut kelembutan-Mu, dan belas kasih-Mu yang besar, ya Tuhan tolonglah kami.

text.language: بل إصنع معنا بحسب دعتك وككثرة رحمتك يارب أعنا.
Mare tenp~roceu,/ Penn/b: i~ e~p~swi m~pekm~yo: m~v~r/] n~han[~lil n~te hanwili: nem hanmaci eukeniw~out.
May our prayers ascend unto You, O our Master, like burnt offerings of lambs, and fatted calves.

language.div: Kiranya doa kami naik pada-Mu, ya Guru kami, seperti kurban bakaran anak domba, dan anak lembu tambun.

text.language: فلتصعد صلاتنا أمامك ياسيدنا مثل محرقات كباش وعجول سِمان.
Mpererp~wbs n~]dia~y/k/: y/e~takcemn/tc nem nenio]: Abraam Icaak Iakwb: Pic~ra/l peyouab n~tak.
Do not forget the covenant, which You have made with our fathers, Abraham Isaac and Jacob, Israel Your holy one.

language.div: Jangan lupakan perjanjian yang, Kau buat dengan bapa kami, Abraham Ishak Yakub, Israel, orang suci-Mu.

text.language: لا تنس العهد الذى قطعته مع أبائنا أبراهيم وإسحق ويعقوب إسرائيل قديسك.
Cmou e~P[oic nilaoc t/rou: nivul/ niacpi n~lac: hwc e~rof maw~ou naf: a~rihouo~ [acf sa nie~neh.
Bless the Lord all you nations, the tribes and all kinds of tongues, praise Him and glorify Him, above all forever.

language.div: suku dan semua bahasa, puji dan muliakan Dia, atas s'galanya selamanya.

text.language: باركوا الرب يا جميع الشعوب والقبائل ولغات الألسن سبحوه ومجدوه وزيدوه علواً إلى الآباد.
Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pisomt n~a~lou n~a~gioc: Cedrak Micak Abdenagw: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O three saintly children, Shadrach Meshach and Abed-Nego, that He may forgive us our sins.

language.div: hai tiga anak saleh, Sadrakh Mesakh dan Abednego, kiranya Dia mengampuni dosa kami.

text.language: أطلبوا من الرب عنا أيها الثلاثة فتية القديسين سدراك وميساك وابدناغو ليغفر لنا خطايانا.
